Name: ngLover
AboutMe:
Upendra Sengar

A motivated and talented youngster, currently working with an esteemed IT firm, MetaDesign Solutions as a software engineer. His endeavors and vigor have made possible the success of a dynamic website that is based on online bookstore in PHP. It can be envisaged as a new and advanced source for selling buying old and new books online. Having acquired excellent technical skills including softwares like Cisco tracer, Microsoft Office, Mysql workbench, languages like AngularJs, C, C++, java, java scripting, shell scripting, HTML, PHP, Jquery, he has been able to prove his competences because of his enthusiastic spirits.

Apart from these skills, Upendra sengar has not taken steps backwards from participating in seminars on Youth India, ethical hacking workshop, technophilia robotics workshop and is also honored with HCL certification for Web Development in PHP. Moreover, he has also put his best foot forward for participating in extra curricular activities. He has been a part of 3rd Bhartiya vigyan sammelan held in Lovely Professional University, 2012.It may awesome interest to know that he has also been a part of Arthrobotix workshop by Technophilia as a coordinator. A zealous, assiduous and concerned younster. He believes in the notion that hard work and determination can move mountains and his endeavors show that his belief is justified!
